posts.post_content:
Payment: Checks & MO are accepted. PayPal Goods will be fine for the Sears, but for the two Ansons, I would greatly prefer check or money order. 
 


The best way to get in touch with me is e-mail. I will get to PMs as soon as I can!

[url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] (this is my paypal e-mail as well)

If you would like to see a massive scan, contact me and I'll send them over.




 N162 Goodwin Champions



1888 N162 Goodwin Champions:    CAP ANSON  - PSA 2  Lowered to $2150 with full insurance on me.

If you would like the actual scan that's enormous, email me and I'll send it over as soon as possible. 

.

open to reasonable offers on Anson N162 and Sears N43! 

.

Edited to add the PSA 4 N162 Cap Anson that is now for sale.

Email: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]
Nate nice cap wow wee good luck,,,
Thanks Octavio, speaking of the Cap, price lowered on that PSA 4 Anson, as well as the PSA 2 Anson - and the N43 PSA 5 card of R.D. Sears
4 month bump, just lowered to a very reasonable price. i think i was shooting too high before! edited to say that Joey F. has been trying to buy this card from me. You guys know what that means...
